draw_connected_2d.name: draw_connected_2d
draw_connected_2d.description: Returns a function that turns a given Curve into a Drawing, by sampling the Curve at num sample points and connecting each pair with a line.

draw_connected_3d.name: draw_connected_3d
draw_connected_3d.description: Returns a function that turns a given 3D Curve into a Drawing, by sampling the 3D Curve at num sample points and connecting each pair with a line.

draw_points_2d.name: draw_points_2d
draw_points_2d.description:
Returns a function that turns a given Curve into a Drawing, by sampling the Curve at num sample points. The Drawing consists of isolated points, and does not connect them. When a program evaluates to a Drawing, the Source system displays it graphically, in a window,

*

draw_points_3d.name: draw_points_3d
draw_points_3d.description:
Returns a function that turns a given 3D Curve into a Drawing, by sampling the 3D Curve at num sample points. The Drawing consists of isolated points, and does not connect them. When a program evaluates to a Drawing, the Source system displays it graphically, in a window,

*

draw_sound_2d.name: draw_sound_2d
draw_sound_2d.description: Visualizes the sound on a 2d line graph

new_plot.name: new_plot
new_plot.description: Adds a new plotly plot to the context which will be rendered in the Plotly Tabs

new_plot_json.name: new_plot_json
new_plot_json.description: Adds a new plotly plot to the context which will be rendered in the Plotly Tabs
